The '''Scions of Arrabar trilogy''' by [[Thomas M. Reid]], is about the deadly feuds between and among the powerful families of [[Arrabar]] in [[Chondath]].

Brief Summary.Scions of Arrabar trilogy:
# ''[[The Sapphire Crescent]]'' (November 2003)
# ''[[The Ruby Guardian]]'' (November 2004)
# ''[[The Emerald Scepter]]'' (August 2005)
